text: Colobothea plebeja is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1902. It is known from Bolivia and Peru.BioLib.cz - Colobothea plebeja. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1902
title: Colobothea plebeja
